walker.easydb.dao
Class ResultAssembler

java.lang.Object
  walker.easydb.dao.ResultAssembler

public abstract class ResultAssembler
extends java.lang.Object

This class builds the BaseEntity object. It transforms query result into BaseEntity object, and put the BaseEntity instance into PageList object.

Author:
HuQingmiao
